meanings.definition: The state or quality of being corrupt.
meanings.sent1: The corruptnesses of the government were exposed by the investigation.
meanings.sent2: We must fight against the corruptnesses in society to create a better world.
meanings.sent3: The corruptnesses in the company's leadership were so obvious, even the interns noticed.
meanings.sent4: The corruptnesses in the system ran deep, like roots of a poisonous tree.
meanings.sent5: The corruptnesses of the organization left a stain that was hard to erase.

meanings.definition: Acts or practices that are morally depraved or dishonest.
meanings.sent1: The corruptnesses of the criminals shocked the entire community.
meanings.sent2: She was appalled by the corruptnesses she witnessed in the business world.
meanings.sent3: The corruptnesses of the politicians were so blatant, it was almost comical.
meanings.sent4: The corruptnesses of the scheme were like a dark cloud hanging over their heads.
meanings.sent5: The corruptnesses of his actions haunted him like a shadow.
